price: Sọ pé: “Ta ni ẹni tí ó ń ṣọ yín ní òru àti ní ọ̀sán níbi ìyà Àjọkẹ́-ayé?” Àmọ́ ńṣe ni wọ́n ń gbúnrí kúrò níbi ìrántí Àjọkẹ́-ayé.
arabic: قُلۡ مَن يَكۡلَؤُكُم بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ مِنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul man yakla-ukum bi-al-layli wal-nahāri mina al-raḥmāni bal hum ʿan dhik'ri rabbihim muʿ'riḍūna
